text: yam heyakin shri lankawa ada parajayata path wuwahoth labana 08 wanida adiled oowal pitiyedima pawathwena thewani awasan maha tharagaya hudekma pradarshana tharagayak bawata pathwanu atha.
ha jathibheda wadaya
nedarlanthayedi idiripathwu mema salasma nawathama guwan thotupalak dakwa gena eemata salasum wi thibenawa.

me yunika roma kotase swabhawayada sanskruthiya saha jathin anuwa wiwidha weyi.
me disayin ekema hat ekak matath hadawaganna oona.”

mata ho kata ho wiwechana thibunath nathath monawa kiwwath rawaya patangaththeth dan pawathinneth me kramaye thiyena gandagahana durwala than nirikshanaya karamin eewa wadath yahapath thanakata gena eema wenuwen.

''yuddhaye athi bihisunu bawa nisa jathyanthara manawawadi nithi kisiwekuta erehiwa chodana ella kirimata pramanawathwana tharam pahadiliwa sudu kalu lesa wen kota handuna gatha nohaki bawa wadi duratath sandahan karana ema niwedanaya, yuda hamuda praharayata samanya wasiyan goduru wima yukthi sahagatha kirime wayamak dara thibe.'' “hamuda meheyumakadi sidukala kriyakarakam sambandhayen winishchaya kirima sandaha ee wenuwata salakillata gathayuthu wanne wenkota handunaganime saha yukthi sahagatha ilakka pilibanda muladharma, yudamaya awashyathawa saha samanupathikathawayi.”
